newsitem.title: FRANCE: Lufthansa improves express deadlines ex-Lyons.
newsitem.headline: Lufthansa improves express deadlines ex-Lyons.

text.p: Lufthansa Cargo said it was now offering shippers in the Lyon region shorter delivery deadlines for its European express product, Flash.
"Since September 1, shippers can deposit goods at our Lyon cargo office until 5pm for next day morning delivery to Europe's major cities," a Paris-based Lufthansa Cargo official told Reuters.
Lufthansa carries express shipments from Lyon on the early evening passenger flight to Frankfurt where they transferred onto the airline's Frankfurt-Cologne "shuttle," the official said

"Previously, a next-day morning deadline from Lyon to European destinations was not possible because the timetabling of the Frankfurt-Cologne shuttle did not match with the arrival of the Lyon-Frankfurt evening flight. However, the shuttle's departure time has been modified"
Cologne serves as a hub for "Flash" traffic with early morning flights to around 25 Europrean cities, the official added. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
